description: Proposed installation of a solar PV (photo voltaic) array comprising 14 modules behind the part-perforated parapet wall of the top floor flat roof surface of the original house structure.
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
OLD/1959/0539 	Severance of part of garden and erection of house adjoining Park Walk - Refused 23/12/1959 
OLD/1966/0665 	Extension at rear of existing premises to provide a doctor's study and consulting room with bedrooms above - Approved with Conditions 07/1/1966. 
OLD/1974/1181 	Erection of a single storey two-bedroom dwelling house in rear garden - Approved with Conditions 17/6/1974. 
OLD/1984/1191 	Demolition of out buildings and erection of extension to provide living space on one level for the applicants disabled mother, with conservatory - Approved with Conditions 27/9/1984. 
OLD/1984/1192 	Listed building consent for demolition of outbuildings and erection of extension - Approved with Conditions 28/9/1984. 
OLD/1989/1458 	Erection of extension to provide living space on one level and conservatory (Removal of condition 3 attached to previous planning permission references No HGY 29718) - Refused 23/5/1989. 
HGY/1989/0348 	Renewal of planning permission HGY 29718 for demolition of outbuilding & erection of extension to provide living space and conservatory - Approved with Conditions 11/7/1989. 
HGY/1990/0505 	Erection of extension to provide living space and conservatory at ground floor level - Approved with Conditions 26/2/1991. 
HGY/1990/0732 	Demolition of existing out buildings. Erection of cottage on land presently part of 96 North Rd and use as a separate family dwelling - Withdrawn 26/2/1991. 
HGY/1990/0735 	Listed Building Consent for demolition of existing outbuilding, erection of cottage on land presently part of 96 North Road and use as a separate family dwelling - Withdrawn 26/1/1991.
